00062                         $this->PermitAccess = get_package( 'permit::permit_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00092             function                change_permits_controller( $Options )
00093             {
00094                   try
00095                   {
00096                         $UserId = $this->Security->get_p( 'record_id' , 'integer' );
00097                         $Permits = $this->Security->get_p( 'permits' , 'command' , array() );
00098                         
00099                         /* deleting groups */
00100                         $HasPermits = $this->PermitAlgorithms->get_permits_for_object( $UserId , 'user' , false );
00101                         foreach( $HasPermits as $p )
00102                         {
00103                               if( in_array( $p , $Permits ) === false )
00104                               {
00105                                     $p = $this->PermitAccess->get_permit_by_name( $p );
00106                                     $this->Link->delete_link( $UserId , $p->id , 'user' , 'permit' );
00107                               }
00108                         }
00109                         
00110                         /* additing groups */
00111                         foreach( $Permits as $p )
00112                         {
00113                               $this->PermitAccess->add_permit_for_object( $p , $UserId , 'user' );
00114                         }
00115                   }
00116                   catch( Exception $e )
00117                   {
00118                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00119                   }
00120             }
00121             
00140             function                change_groups_controller( $Options )
00141             {
00142                   try
00143                   {
00144                         $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_by_id( $this->Security->get_p( 'record_id' , 'integer' ) );
00145                         $Groups = $this->Security->get_p( 'groups' , 'command' , array() );
00146                         
00147                         /* deleting groups */
00148                         $HasGroups = $this->GroupAccess->get_groups_for_object( get_field( $User , 'id' ) , 'user' );
00149                         foreach( $HasGroups as $g )
00150                         {
00151                               if( in_array( $g , $Groups ) === false )
00152                               {
00153                                     $g = $this->GroupAccess->get_group_by_name( $g );
00154                                     $this->Link->delete_link( get_field( $User,  'id' ) , $g->id , 'user' , 'group' );
00155                               }
00156                         }
00157                         
00158                         /* additing groups */
00159                         foreach( $Groups as $p )
00160                         {
00161                               $this->GroupAccess->add_group_for_object( $p , get_field( $User , 'id' ) , 'user' );
00162                         }
00163                   }
00164                   catch( Exception $e )
00165                   {
00166                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00167                   }
00168             }

00188             function                change_permits_view( $Options )
00189             {
00190                   try
00191                   {
00192                         $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_by_id( 
00193                               $this->Security->get_p( 'user_permits_record_id' , 'integer' )
00194                         );
00195                         $this->Output  = '<script src="'.dirname( __FILE__ ).'/include/js/permits.js"></script>';
00196                         $this->Output .= '<center><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr>'.
00197                               '<td>{lang:user_login} : '.$User->login.'</td></tr><tr><td>{permit_list_widget:object='.
00198                               '{http_param:name=user_permits_record_id;type=integer;post=1};all={permit_list};'.
00199                               'object_permits={permit_list_for_object:type=user;object={http_param:name=user_permits_record_id;'.
00200                               'type=integer;post=1}}}</td></tr></table></center>';
00201                   }
00202                   catch( Exception $e )
00203                   {
00204                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00268             function                controller( $Options )
00269             {
00270                   try
00271                   {
00272                         $ContextSet = get_package_object( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00273                         
00274                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_change_permits_controller' );
00275                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_change_groups_controller' );
00276                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
00277                   }
00278                   catch( Exception $e )

00280                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
